title: Ep. 69: 'The Night Of' and a VMA Recap
description:
Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald offer their differing thoughts on the 'Night Of' season finale (2:00). Then, the two give their takes on the VMAs, including the performances (and nonperformances) by Drake, Taylor Swift, and Chance the Rapper (26:30).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
